record.description: Blake Hall, the new seminary building at Morgan Park will be dedicated Tuesday, April 17th at 2 p. m. President G. W. Northrup will preside. A brief statement will be made by Dr. T. W. Goodspeed, and addresses will be made by Dr. W. M. Lawrence of Illinois, Dr. M. G. Hodge of Wisconsin, Dr. S. Haskell of Michigan, and Dr. D. B. Cherry of Ohio. The faculty cordially invites you to be present.
